scripts.dev: bunx concurrently --names web,api "cd apps/web && bun run dev" "cd apps/api && bun run dev"
scripts.build: bun run build:api && bun run build:web
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:web && bun run typecheck:api
scripts.lint: bun run lint:web && bun run lint:api
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/dist apps/*/.output apps/*/.vinxi apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules node_modules
